description: NTS Map: 093G15. A wide variety of XC (and hikin' and bikin') trails up by Prince George.  Note: There may be user fees here.These Guys hang out there a lot.
directions: Take Ospika Blvd N north of 5th Ave., to where it meets up with Otway Road, turn right (NW) and follow it to the parking area.
title: Otway XC
